title: The Developing image
creator_credit: David Hopwood and Northern Virginia Community College. Extended Learning Institute
brief_description: Explores the marvellous invention of the camera, using colour and music to evoke the period. This series takes viewers from the daguerreotype to wet plate to tintype and onwards examining hundreds of exemplary photographs. It dramatically depicts various themes in the history of photography.
